argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_tron | |- Tr On |
| 2 |  | #P_df-on | |- On = { x | Ord x } |
| 3 | 2 | #P_abeq2i | |- ( x e. On <-> Ord x ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ordtr | |- ( Ord x -> Tr x ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylbi | |- ( x e. On -> Tr x ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_rgen | |- A. x e. On Tr x |
| 7 |  | #P_df-iord | |- ( Ord On <-> ( Tr On /\ A. x e. On Tr x ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 6, 7 | #P_mpbir2an | |- Ord On |
